snippet: Hanan Hroub, who recently won a $1 million global education prize, developed her play-therapy approach to help her own children cope with the trauma of violence.
abstract: Saturday Profile of Hanan Hroub, Palestinian schoolteacher in West Bank who has been awarded $1 million education prize by Varkey Foundation; Hroub developed teaching methods built around educational games for children traumatized by violence.
lead_paragraph: Hanan Hroub, who recently won a $1 million global education prize, developed her play-therapy approach to help her own children cope with the trauma of violence.

headline.print_headline: Prizewinning Palestinian Teacher Fights Trauma With Play
headline.main: A Palestinian Teacher’s Methods Earn the Attention of More Than Her Class
